title: KHR_audio_graph Notch Filter Node
description: The notch filter (also known as a band-stop or band-rejection filter) is the opposite of a bandpass filter. It allows all frequencies through, except for a set of frequencies.

id.description: A unique identifier of the notch filter node in the scene.

frequency.description: The center frequency of where the boost is applied.

qualityFactor.description: Controls the width of the band of frequencies that are boosted. A large value implies a narrow width.

bypass.description: Disables this filter while still allowing unprocessed audio signals to pass.
